pull_requests.title: BIP 0070: Fix output use
pull_requests.body:
## description
* `Output` is used in `PaymentDetails` rather than `PaymentRequest`

## how to review?
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0070/paymentrequest.proto#L20
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0070/paymentrequest.proto#L27-L33

comment_list.body: @dancer1325 Thank you for your diligence. This BIP is in final status since 2014 (8571f42a6), the BIP authors are unlikely to sign-off on further changes, and the current text looks fine, so closing here -- thanks!
